name: Wargaming - Mercenaries and Legends
description:
80% off!? Join the ranks of Mercenaries and Legends with the best deal in our history!

Dominate the battle on land and at sea with this unstoppable array of heavy armor.

This bundle is packed with deadly weaponry including: - Patriot T26E5 - Tiger 131 - TOG II - Churchill III - Captured KV-1 - Bogatyr KV-220-2 - Bogatyr Hero crew with Iron Mace skill - Texas Battleship - Arkansas Battleship
